Interface EJBObjectCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FIFOEJBObjectCache, UnboundedEJBObjectCache

    public interface EJBObjectCache
extends Cache
    An interface for accessing EJB(Local)Object caches
    Author:
    Mahesh Kannan
